Available voice commands. Commands are organized into four groups.
For recognizing objects, say: Recognize, to identify objects in your camera view. What do I see, to hear the last recognition result again. Repeat, to hear the last announcement again.
For navigation, say: Navigate, to start turn-by-turn directions. Where am I, to hear your current location. Cancel, to stop navigation or recognition.
For adjusting settings, say: Settings, to open preferences. High contrast on or High contrast off, to toggle visual mode. Increase speed or Decrease speed, to adjust speech rate.
For general actions, say: History, to review past recognitions. Save location, to bookmark your current place. Back, to go back. Home, to return to the home screen.
